content: stitch and slip_stitch in the next stitch row 8 3 repeat the large spike row 8 2 another 3 times across the back stuff stop now with 3 spikes left to complete and stuff the dinosaur it only needs very light stuffing in the body we want the dinosaur to be a bit squashy so it sits flat on all four feet row 8 4 continue and finish the last three spikes complete two more large spikes and then the last one is a small spike finish with a slip_stitch in the same stitch as the last spike close cut the thread and tie off thread in the two loose ends from the spikes threads give each of the spikes a tug up and pull on the 4 feet to shape if you choose you can add a crocheted chain length to hang the dinosaur from at the top criss wall https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/all-in-one-dinosaur-stegosaurus criss wall https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/all-in-one-dinosaur-stegosaurus criss wall https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/all-in-one-dinosaur-stegosaurus
